response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $10,000 for the product. This offer takes into account both the value the product holds for you and my desire to maximize the return on this valuable item. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 10000}
